title: Analysis of ICT Utilization and Language Learning Outcomes Correlation

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Mobile platform-based education utilizing learners' personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Explain the correlation between ICT usage patterns and language learning outcomes according to PISA secondary analysis methodology.
Analyze the impact of national-level ICT infrastructure indicators (economic/educational/human capital) on individual learning outcomes.
Evaluate the relationship between language learning attitudes (ICT attitudes) and cognitive/affective achievement using empirical data in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
